tool_description: Translate from English to Jive. Jive talk ( or Harlem Jive) was the distintive slang which developed in Harlem, NY and subsequently adopted more widely in US. Its use peaked in 1940s.
name: Jive Translator
title: Jive Translator

api_list.name: Jive Translator
api_list.description: Translate from English to Jive Speak.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to convert to Jive speak.
required_parameters.default: Good morning and I love flying. God this is great!
